headline: Jim Cramer Sees Howmet Aerospace (HWM) as a Quiet Bull Market Play – No Sign of Quitting!
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Looked At These 23 Stocks Recently. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE:HWM) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer looked at recently. Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, offered an optimistic perspective on the market on […]
